item.title: 206. Reverse Linked List
item.description: Link: https://leetcode.com/problems/reverse-linked-list/ Solution: linked-list Code: linked-list # Time Complexity: O(n) # Space Complexity: O(1) class Solution: def twoSum(self, nums: List[int], target: int) -> List[int]: hashMap = {} for i, num in enumerate(nums): rest = target - num if rest in hashMap: return [i, hashMap[rest] ] hashMap[num] = i
